UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Cell-Selective Pore Forming Antimicrobial Peptides of the Prodomain of Human Furin: A Conserved Aromatic/Cationic Sequence Mapping, Membrane Disruption, and Atomic-Resolution Structure and Dynamics.
Literature.Author: Sinha S, Harioudh MK, Dewangan RP, Ng WJ, Ghosh JK, Bhattacharjya S

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:40% hemolysis=100 µM,Human erythrocytes:55% Hemolysis=150 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli(MIC=4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>100µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=>100µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=>100µM),Bacillus subtilis(MIC=>100µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>100µM),Streptococcus pyogenes ATCC 19615(MIC=>100µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=>100µM)
